# ğŸ½ï¸ Restaurant Sentiment Analysis Dashboard

An interactive web dashboard that analyzes and visualizes restaurant reviews using Natural Language Processing (NLP).  
Built with **Flask**, **Plotly Dash**, and **JWT authentication** for secure, data-driven insights.

## ğŸš€ Features
- Secure login and logout using JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
- Sentiment trend visualization and keyword analytics
- Role-based dashboards for restaurant users
- Interactive filtering by sentiment, keywords, or location

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack
Python, Flask, Plotly Dash, SQLite, Pandas, HTML/CSS, JWT
